text: @ChristinaKTLA @DevilDog3325 @GavinNewsom It's possible they have been told the masks do not work and they do not care since the death rate of COVID19 is lower than the seasonal Flu. Unfortunately for them, Earth has herd immunity to most strains of the flu. Influenza has been around longer than SARS_COV_2.
